job.title: Jr Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Experience needed: 0-5 years</p><p>Its an in office position south Indianapolis, Indiana area, relocation is required, starting salaries is negotiable, were willing train up if necessary. Our tech stack is React, Node, Python, Postgresql, &amp; React Native.</p><p>You would be working on database intake systems improving query performance &amp; building charts, various user interfaces for clients &amp; staff to interact with our weather data. Other work may include rebuilding our legacy website, upgrading maintaining our application, &amp; building up our API, &amp; more. This is a full stack position you may be required to learn languages &amp; tools you have never used before. This is an on call position if a bug comes up you must be available to drop everything &amp; fix it if necessary.</p>
